description: Destined to become a family favourite, this chicken parmigiana burger recipe is perfect for an easy midweek dinner.
keywords: Chicken burger,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Jan Feb 2021,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Chicken Parmigiana Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place chicken on tray and spray with a little oil. Cook for 10 minutes or until heated through.

Spoon sauce over chicken, season, then scatter over mozzarella. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese has melted. Top each chicken with a basil leaf, spray with a little oil, then bake for a further 5 minutes or until cheese is golden.
Spread bun bases with mayonnaise, then top with tomato, baby rocket leaves and chicken. Sandwich with bun tops and serve.
